Trade.constraint: Trade Validation must occur immediately after Trade Execution.
Final Settlement must be completed within T+2 days.
Must follow all other trade activities.

Order.constraint: Client Limit Validation must follow Quote Provided.
ISDA Master Agreement Check and KYC Refresh Check must happen before Best Execution Validation.
Exercise Decision must be made within 24 hours of Best Execution Validation.

Position.constraint: Risk Assessment must immediately follow Position Reconciliation.
Collateral Management must complete before Risk Transfer Executed.

MarketData.constraint: Volatility Surface Analysis must occur immediately after Market Data Validation.
Premium Calculation must be completed before CSA Verification.
Transaction Reporting Check must precede Regulatory Reporting Generation.

Client.constraint: Credit Check must occur before providing Settlement Instructions.
Premium Settlement must follow all other client-related activities.
